name: Solicitations or awards in violation of law
text: The provisions of section 103D-706 and section 103D-707 apply where it is determined by the chief procurement officer or a designee under section 103D-701 or 103D-703 or where it is determined administratively under section 103D-709, or upon judicial review under section 103D-710 or judicial action under section 103D-711, that a solicitation or award of a contract is in violation of the law. [L Sp 1993, c 8, pt of §2; am L 1999, c 162, §4]
